Title: Provides that bond anticipation notes issued during calendar years 2015 and 2016 may not extend more than 7 years beyond original date of issuance of such bond notes
Summary: Provides that bond anticipation notes issued during calendar years 2015 and 2016 may not extend more than 7 years beyond original date of issuance of such bond notes.
LawCode: Amd ยง23.00, Loc Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the local finance law, in relation to bond anticipation notes issued during the calendar years 2015 and 2016
